title: Girl, 6, hit in NE OKC drive-by shooting
content:
OKLAHOMA CITY —
A 6-year-old girl was hit during a drive-by shooting Wednesday night in northeast Oklahoma City, police officials said.
The shooting was reported at a home in the 2400 block of East Madison Street, near Northeast 23rd Street and Interstate 35. Police say the girl was inside the home when the shooting happened.
The girl was found with a gunshot wound to her left lower back, according to a police report. She was taken to an area hospital.
Police do not have a suspect description.
